vulnerable_code: public boolean verify(String hostname, SSLSession sslSession) {if ("192.168.0.10".equals(hostname)) {return true;} else {HostnameVerifier hv = HttpsURLConnection.getDefaultHostnameVerifier();return hv.verify(hostname, sslSession);}}
description: The code does not perform proper validation of SSL certificates. It simply returns true for a specific IP address without validating the SSL certificate chain for other hostnames.
recommendation: Properly validate SSL certificates for all hostnames, rather than simply returning true for a specific IP address. Consider using a custom TrustManager to implement stricter certificate validation.
